thread.title: Wales v Ireland: win rugby tickets and hospitality
thread.title_full: Wales v Ireland: win rugby tickets and hospitality - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Wales v Ireland: win rugby tickets and hospitality
text: Dove Men+Care has teamed up with the Telegraph to offer readers the chance to win a hospitality box for 10 people at the Wales v Ireland game at the Millennium Stadium on Saturday, August 8, 2015, as part of the Dove Men Tests. The winner, plus nine guests, will watch this mouth-watering clash from the comfort of a hospitality box with food and drink included. The winner will also receive a Â£200 travel allowance. Follow @dovemen for more exclusive rugby content and competitions. In association with For your chance to win this fantastic prize, fill in the form below by midnight on Sunday August 2, 2015: Online Form - Win VIP rugby tickets and hospitality to Wales v Ireland
